SELECT a.session_id AS sessionId, b.id AS friendUserId, b.uuid AS friendShowId, IF(c.name = '', b.nickname, c.name) AS friendShowName, c.avatar_url AS avatarUrl
FROM base_im_friend a
LEFT JOIN base_user_info b ON b.id = a.friend_id
LEFT JOIN base_im_session_ref_user c ON c.target_id = a.friend_id AND c.user_id = a.belong_id
WHERE a.belong_id = #{currentUserId}
AND b.id IS NOT NULL
AND c.session_id IS NOT NULL
AND ( b.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.searchKey}, '%') OR c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.searchKey}, '%') OR b.uuid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.searchKey}, '%') )
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
